# apply(_:to:animatingDifferences:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the section UI to reflect the state of the data in the specified snapshot, optionally animating the UI changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func apply(_ snapshot: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionSnapshot<ItemIdentifierType>, to section: SectionIdentifierType, animatingDifferences: Bool = true) async
```

## Updating section data

- **snapshot(for:)**: Returns a representation of the current state of the data in the specified section of the collection view.
- **apply(_:to:animatingDifferences:completion:)**: Updates the section UI to reflect the state of the data in the specified snapshot, optionally animating the UI changes and executing a completion handler.
